wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Boyce (born 5 November 1989) is an English footballer who plays as a defender for National League side Eastleigh. He most recently played for Grimsby Town, and previously played for Gainsborough Trinity, Lincoln City, Scunthorpe United, Notts County, Hartlepool United and Grimsby Town.
